Kristijanova senka i dalje prekriva Madrid
Da objasnimo – otkako je Kristijano otišao u Juventus prošle godine Realu nedostaje ogromna porcija golova. Benzemi ponestaje municije, a Jović, Bejl, Azarm Rodrigo, Modrić i ostali mahom ispaljuju ćorke...

04 Nov 2019

Real Madrid je u golgeterskoj krizi i ovaj problem sve više uzima maha! Posle siromašnih 0:0 protiv Betisa proteklog vikenda Španijom je odjeknula zabrinjavajuća poruka da se ne pamti kada je Kraljevski klub imao toliki fond igrača – 26 u rotaciji – uz tako slab učinak u napadačkoj trećini...
Posle četvrtine sezone Zinedin Zidan na terenu nije koristio samo Marijana Dijaza, uz Marka Asensija koji zbog kidanja prednjih ukrštenih ligamenata verovatno neće ni biti u rotaciji do naredne jeseni.
Real Madridu su pod hitno potrebni golovi! To nije preterivanje, već suva realnost. Marijano Dijaz dosad nije upotrebljavan, Karim Benzema i Luka Jović su nedodirljivi, Eden Azar definitivno nije opravdao račun od 100.000.000 evra, dok su se ostali utopili u sivilo najvećih klupskih zvezda.
Zaključak je prost – Madrid i dalje pokriva senka Kristijana Ronalda. Da objasnimo – otkako je Kristijano otišao u Juventus prošle godine Realu nedostaje ogromna porcija golova. Benzemi ponestaje municije, a Jović, Bejl, Azarm Rodrigo, Modrić i ostali mahom ispaljuju ćorke...



Ambiciozni Florentino Perez je napravio ozbiljan kiks. Zidanovog naslednika Đulena Lopetegija ostavio je u neprijatnoj situaciji, bez adekvatne zamene za Kristijana Ronalda i sve ono što je jedan od najboljih u istoriji fudbala donosio Kraljevskom klubu na terenu. Pošto je uvideo grešku, Perez je letos stukao preko 300.000.000 evra u pojačanja, ali Real još nije profitirao. Azar kao “galaktička“ zamena za Ronalda ne igra ni izbliza tako dobro kao Portugalac, a i pored silnih igračkih kvaliteta jednostavno nema sposobnost da beleži 50 golova po sezoni. Jović je angažovan da bi jednog dana potpuno odmenio Benzemu, ne Kristijana. Srpski napadač još traži svoje mesto pod suncem, ali je bar probio led i najavio da bi mogao da uđe u prošlosezonsku formu.
Da li je to dovoljno da Real stane na stabilne noge? Ne. Ironično, najkorisniji igrač Reala u dosadašnjem delu sezone bio je Geret Bejl s po dva gola i asistencije, iako je Karim Benzema na vrhu liste strelaca sa sedam recki.
Madridska Marka izvukla je statistiku u poslednjih jedanaest godina i činjenica je da Real mnogo pati zbog Kristijana... Ove sezone postignuto je 24 gola i 209 šuteva. To je uspešnost od svega 11,48 odsto. To je lošije čak i od prošle sezone, kada je Real ostao na svega 14,79 odsto pogodaka! U sezonama kada je Kristijano nosio belo, Real se kretao na oko 20 odsto uspešnosti, što znači da je svaki pet udarac ka golu bio pogodak. Sada je odnos gotovo jedan prema deset. A, Real od Kristijanovog odlaska beleži otprilike po 18 šuteva u proseku. Golovi koji su nekada bili sigurni, sada su samo debeli promašaji koji sve skuplje koštaju tim.



Istina, Ronaldova statistika u Juventusu nije tako impozantna kao što je bila tokom godina kada je svoje ime isklesao u Realovim temeljima, ali razvod Kralja i Kristijana ostavlja sve ozbiljnije posledice...
Real je trenutno 22. klub u Ligama petice po efikasnosti. S 24 golova na 14 utakmica i pogotkom na svakih pedeset dva i po minuta. Poređenja radi, Mančester Siti je ubeležio čak 20 golova više za isto vreme. U Španiji Barselona je na 33, a Viljareal na 25 golova...

Christian's shadow still covers Madrid
Let's explain - since Cristiano left for Juventus last year, Real have been missing a huge portion of goals. Benzemi runs out of ammunition, and Jovic, Bale, Azarm Rodrigo, Modric, and the rest of them are firing shorts ...

04 Nov 2019

Real Madrid is in a goaltending crisis and this problem is getting bigger! After a poor 0-0 draw against Betis last weekend, Spain was alarmed by the worrying message that it did not remember when the Royal Club had so many players - 26 in rotation - with such poor performance in the attacking third ...
After a quarter of the season, Zinedine Zidan did not only use Marian Diaz on the field, with Mark Asensi likely due to tearing of the anterior cruciate ligaments until next fall.
Real Madrid need urgently goals! It is not an exaggeration but a dry reality. Mariano Diaz has not been used so far, Karim Benzema and Luka Jovic are untouchable, Eden Azar definitely did not justify the € 100,000,000 bill, while the others drowned in the grayness of the biggest club stars.
The conclusion is simple - Madrid is still covered by the shadow of Christian Ronald. Let's explain - since Cristiano left for Juventus last year, Real have been missing a huge portion of goals. Benzemi runs out of ammunition, and Jovic, Bale, Azarm Rodrigo, Modric, and the rest of them are firing shorts ...



The ambitious Florentino Perez made a serious joke. He left Zidan's successor, Julen Lopetegi, in an embarrassing situation, without an adequate replacement for Christian Ronald and all that one of the best in football history has brought to the Royal Club in the field. Seeing the mistake, Perez has earned over € 300,000,000 in reinforcements this summer, but Real has not yet profited. As a "galactic" replacement for Ronaldo, Azar does not play nearly as well as the Portuguese, and despite his strong player qualities, he simply does not have the ability to record 50 goals per season. Jovic was hired to one day completely abolish Benzema, not Christian. The Serbian striker is still looking for his place under the sun, but at least broke the ice and announced he could get into last season's form.
Is this enough to get Real on its stable feet? No. Ironically, Real's most useful player so far this season has been Geret Bale with two goals and assists, although Karim Benzema tops the list with seven rushers.
The Madrid Mark has drawn statistics for the last eleven years and the fact is that Real has suffered a lot because of Christian ... 24 goals and 209 goals have been scored this season. That's just 11.48 percent performance. This is even worse than last season, when Real remained at just 14.79 percent! In seasons when Cristiano wore white, Real moved at around 20 percent performance, meaning every five shots on goal were a hit. Now the ratio is almost one to ten. And, since Christian's departure, Real has recorded approximately 18 shots on average. Goals that used to be safe are now just thick misses that cost the team more and more expensive.



True, Ronald's statistics at Juventus are not as imposing as they were over the years when he carved his name into Real's foundations, but the divorce of King and Christian leaves all the more serious consequences ...
Real is currently the 22nd club in the League of Five in efficiency. With 24 goals in 14 games and a goal every fifty-two and a half minutes. By comparison, Manchester City have scored as many as 20 goals over the same time. In Spain, Barcelona is at 33 and Villarreal at 25 goals ...
